column1: Little Goat Diner////Great service from friendly people.  Beautiful decor.  Solid food
column2: but I wish there were some lighter options.  Everything on the menu sounded like it would be something I would regret eating.  I had the whitefish tostadas and I sampled the goat chili
column3: and both were tasty.  My chardonnay was a little bland for $13/glass
